fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

big_boy_shells.name: Big Boy Shells
big_boy_shells.description: For the extreme fireworker, these shells will put on a show at 2,000 feet.

low_shot.name: Low Shot
low_shot.description: Sit on the chair and wait until you are shot up in the air to 30 feet.

evel_knievel.name: Evel Knievel
evel_knievel.description: Sit in the patriotic chair and you'll soon be soaring to 150 feet in the air. We accept no liability for injury.

bluegill_angler.name: Bluegill Angler
bluegill_angler.description: These sized down explosives are sure to make your fishing day short and effective, specializing in the smaller Bluegill species.

catfish_angler.name: Catfish Angler
catfish_angler.description: This 'father' of the smaller model will knock out any catfish in your lake (and also anything smaller than that, we guess).

sapling_derooter.name: Sapling Derooter
sapling_derooter.description: To help you remove that unplanned small tree stump in your backyard.

old_oak_destroyer.name: Old Oak Destroyer
old_oak_destroyer.description: Don't grind that huge stump, this is more fun.

scare_crower.name: Scare Crower
scare_crower.description: A small and load explosive to truly scare those crows away.

scare_fincher.name: Scare Fincher
scare_fincher.description: Another one of our pocket sized blow ups to scare those nasty finch away.

ShaleNotPass.name: ShaleNotPass
ShaleNotPass.description: Specializing in shale, this large bomb will clear 1 acre at a time.

Limestoner.name: Limestoner
Limestoner.description: DISCLAIMER: our most powerful of all. If you're tired of that beatiful limestone, this will get rid of it 2 acres at a time.
